mfs_dir_ent_block Struct Reference

#include <xilmfs.h>

Detailed Description

dir entry contains file name and index of first file block mfs_dir_entry_blocks are contained in a mfs_dir_block size of mfs_dir_ent_block determines size of mfs_dir_block - see below Make the size a multiple of 4 bytes to ensure alignment at 4 byte boundaries
